means: [地名] [爱尔兰] 普罗斯珀勒斯

sentence.Network_en: Padua and Vicenza are prosperous, well-preserved cities, not overrun by tourists.
sentence.Network_cn: 帕多瓦和维琴察两市商业繁荣，建筑古迹保存良好，也没有蜂拥而至的游客。

sentence.Network_en: Rajneesh was the darling of a prosperous family.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗杰尼希是一个富有家庭的宠儿。

sentence.Network_en: Suburbs sprawled out to provide homes for the newly prosperous.
sentence.Network_cn: 市郊无规划地向外扩展以为新近富起来的人提供住房.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French prospereus, from Latin prosperus 'doing well'

entry.tran: 富足的；成功的；兴旺的；繁荣的
entry.def: Prosperous people, places, and economies are rich and successful.

example.ex: ...the youngest son of a relatively prosperous British family...
example.tran: 一个相对富裕的英国家族中最小的儿子

example.ex: The place looks more prosperous than ever.

means.word_mean: 1. in fortunate circumstances financially; moderately rich;

sentences.sentence: "they were comfortable or even wealthy by some standards"
"the halcyon days of the clipper trade"

means.word_mean: 4. tending to favor or bring good luck;

sentences.sentence: "a favorable time to ask for a raise"
"a prosperous moment to make a decision"

auth_sentence.content: Is this middle class growing, happy and prosperous?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is this middle class growing, happy and prosperous?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is this middle class growing, happy and prosperous?

auth_sentence.content: We want a safe and prosperous shore area.
auth_sentence.res_content: We want a safe and prosperous shore area.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We want a safe and prosperous shore area.

auth_sentence.content: Prosperous and educated people who should know better are worse.
auth_sentence.res_content: Prosperous and educated people who should know better are worse.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Prosperous and educated people who should know better are worse.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不顾一切的,铤而走险的;绝望的,危急的
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉+sper希望+ate……的→去掉希望的
pro很多+sper希望+ous……的→希望很多→兴旺的
a不+sper希望+ity表名词→不给人希望→粗鲁,暴力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 暴徒,[尤指早期美国西部的]亡命之徒
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉,无+sper希望+ado人→无希望之人
desperate[adj.不顾一切的,铤而走险的;绝望的,危急的]+ion表名词→n.铤而走险,拼命
prosper繁荣+ity表名词→n.繁荣,兴旺

stems_affixes.value_cn: 成功,兴隆,昌盛,使成功,使昌隆,繁荣
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro很多+sper希望→很多的希望→繁荣

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"赞同,亲…"; 2. 也有"代替"之意; 3. 表示"向前,在前;预先"; 4. 表示"很多…"

stems_affixes.word_buile: pro赞同,亲…+American美国的, 美洲的→adj.亲美的
pro赞同,亲…+slavery奴隶制→adj.赞成奴隶制的
pro=pro向前,在前;预先+ig=act做→做在前面,做得多→大量的
pro向前,在前;预先+fici做+ent……的→做在[别人] 前面→精通
pro向前,在前;预先+min小,伸+ent……的→向前伸出的小部分→杰出的
pro向前,在前;预先+vid看+ent……的→向前看的→有远见的
pro很多…+flig打出+ate……的→把钱不断的打出去→挥霍的
pro很多…+fuse流→流很多→大量的
pro很多…+lif+ic……的→带来东西→多产的
pro很多…+sper希望+ous……的→希望很多→兴旺的
pro代替+louct说+or人→n. 议长;代言人
pro代替+noun名词→n.代名词
pro向前+blem抛→抛出问题
pro向前,在前;预先+cliv倾斜+ity表名词→向前倾斜
pro向前,在前;预先+fil线条+e→前面的线条
pro向前,在前;预先+gress走→向前走
pro向前,在前;预先+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
pro向前,在前;预先+logue说→在前面说→前言
pro向前,在前;预先+spect看→向前看→前景
pro很多…+fit=fic做→做很多→做得好→利润
pro向前,在前;预先+cure关心→关心在前→[想要]获得
pro向前,在前;预先+fess说→在前面说坦白
pro向前,在前;预先+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
pro向前,在前;预先+long长→向前拉长→延长
pro向前,在前;预先+mot动+e→向前动→促进
pro向前,在前;预先+pel推→向前推
pro向前,在前;预先+secu追随+te→追随到[法院]前面→检举;指控
pro向前,在前;预先+trud推,突出+e→向前突出
pro向前,在前;预先+vok喊+e→在[你]前面喊→激怒[你]
pro很多…+crastin明天+ate表动词→有许多明天明日复明日→拖延
pro很多…+create创造→创造很多→生儿育女
pro很多…+lifer=fer带来+ate表动词→带来很多生命→繁殖

Sentence.sentence: Two world wars and a Great Depression rocked the confidence of many people that scientific expertise alone could create a prosperous and ordered world.

means.word_mean: 成功的, 繁荣的, 兴旺的

sentences.en: It used to be a very prosperous town.
After their misfortunes the family slowly became prosperous.
sentences.cn: 灾难过后, 他们家又慢慢地兴盛起来。
